product_name: Repel Sportsmen Stick Insect Repellent - 30 Percent DEET - 1 oz.
long_description: Repel Sportsmen Stick insect repellent is easy to apply to your face, arms, neck and legs to make your outdoor adventures more enjoyable. 30% DEET formula provides effective, long-lasting protection from mosquitoes, gnats, chiggers, ticks, no-see-ums, fleas and biting flies. Just rub the stick evenly over exposed skin; do not apply near eyes or mouth. Repels insects for up to 8 hrs.
short_description: Repel Sportsmen Stick insect repellent is easy to apply to your face, arms, neck and legs to make your outdoor adventures more enjoyable.
